casebody.data:
CABARRUS COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION
v.
DEPARTMENT OF STATE TREASURER, et al. 369PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 7, 2019 Blake W. Thomas, Deputy General Counsel, Raleigh, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, Raleigh, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Michael Crowell, Attorney at Law, for Cabarrus County Board of Education. Deborah R. Stagner, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cabarrus County Board of Education. Elizabeth L. Troutman, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for N.C. School Boards Association. Jill R. Wilson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for N.C. School Boards Association. Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy, for N.C. School Boards Association. Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Joseph A. Newsome, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Lindsey V. Smith, Attorney at Law, for Cabarrus County Board of Education.

*644The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of August 2019 by North Carolina School Board Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of August 2019."
